PHRASE.LANG: T-shirt de recrue de l'ISA Killzone®3 (pour Femme)
Maglietta da recluta ISA di Killzone®3 (donna)
Camiseta de recluta de la ISA Killzone®3 (mujer)
Awarded for supplying gunners who are successful in Phase 1 of the Killzone® event in the ISA fight against Helghast oppression. [#Legal]
Récompense pour avoir soutenu les tireurs et remporté la phase 1 de l'épreuve Killzone®, dans le combat de l'ISA contre l'oppression helghaste. [#Legal]
Wird für die Versorgung von Schützen vergeben, die in Welle 1 des Killzone®-Events im Kampf der ISA gegen die Unterdrückung der Helghast erfolgreich waren. [#Legal]
Assegnata per aver rifornito gli artiglieri vincenti nella fase 1 dell'evento Killzone® nella lotta degli ISA contro l'oppressione degli Helghast. [#Legal]
Otorgada por proveer de suministros a los artilleros que tuvieron éxito en la 1.ª oleada del evento Killzone® en la lucha de la ISA contra la opresión Helghast. [#Legal]
Awarded for supplying gunners who are successful in Phase 1 of the Killzone® event in the ISA fight against Helghast oppression. [#Legal]
Awarded for supplying gunners who are successful in Phase 1 of the Killzone® event in the ISA fight against Helghast oppression. [#Legal]
